name: Platglitcher
description:
A standart platformer, or is it?

This game was created for the Blackthornprod GAME JAM #3 with the theme Less is more. This is our first game jam!

Platglitcher is a platformer based game. There is A FULL COMPLETE STORY in it. The SIMULATION is going to be the best experience that you have.

It's also tested 100 times before, to make sure that you have an unforgettable experience!

How to play:
  • Easy, just click on "Run game" button. Or download the game!
  • There is an included tutorial so you can make sure that you understand every mechanic in the simulation!
  • The best setup is W, A, D + Mouse for the simulation!
  • R to restart!
